Class WebSocketConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.github._1c_syntax.bsl.languageserver.websocket.WebSocketConfiguration
@Configuration @ConditionalOnWebApplication @EnableWebSocket public class WebSocketConfiguration extends Object
